    test_vignette

    pre_process

    pre_process.Rd

    This function preprocess the data-inputs and automatically sets uniform format for future use.

    Usage

    pre_process(
  dataList,
  typenameList = NULL,
  replaceNA = TRUE,
  scale = TRUE,
  autoColName = "Day_"
)

    Arguments

    dataList

    A list of datasets. Note that for each dataset, the first columns should be ID and the rest columns are Time1, Time2, ...

    typenameList

    A vector of dataset names.

    scale

    Logical; if TRUE (default), scale the datasets by row. See also scale_by_row__

    autoColName

    A string; if it's not NULL (default), automatically set uniform column names for all the datasets.

    replaceNa

    Logical; if TRUE (default), replace NA with 0.

    Examples

    data(samples)
a <- pre_process(samples)
head(a,10)
